channel.title: playstation on Fandoming
channel.description: Recent content in playstation on Fandoming

item.title: Rockstar Ends 2024 Strong with Red Dead Redemption PC Release
item.description: Red Dead Redemption is finally getting a fully optimized PC port on October 29, 2024, ending a 14-year wait.

item.title: Resident Evil Ends Five-Year Streak with No New Game in 2024
item.description: No new Resident Evil game in 2024, ending a five-year streak of annual releases.

item.title: New Silent Hill 2 Theory Reveals Dark Truth About Save Mechanic
item.description: Fan theory suggests red save squares in Silent Hill 2 Remake capture James’ soul.

item.title: Blizzard's Overwatch 2 Mobile Project Sparks Fan Backlash
item.description: Blizzard is reportedly developing an Overwatch 2 mobile version, but the project hasn’t been officially confirmed.

item.title: FBC: Firebreak - A Supernatural Co-op Shooter from the Makers of Control
item.description: FBC: Firebreak is a co-op multiplayer game set in the Control universe, focusing on teams battling paranormal threats.

item.title: GTA 6 Online Might Feature Interactive Prisons and Player Factions
item.description: Prison system in GTA 6 Online could add new layers of gameplay, including bribery, jailbreaks, and in-prison tasks.

item.title: Stellar Blade Fan Creates Eye-Catching Custom DualSense Controller
item.description: Fan creates a custom DualSense controller inspired by Eveâ€™s suit from Stellar Blade, impressing the PlayStation community.

item.title: Season 13 of Overwatch 2 Arrives October 15 With Halloween Vibes
item.description: Season 13 drops October 15 with dark magic and Halloween-themed content.

item.title: Is GTA 6 Delayed? Rumors Point to 2026 Release Window
item.description: Rumor claims GTA 6 has been delayed to early/mid-2026, with PC release 12-18 months after consoles.

item.title: Stellar Blade Developer Sued for Copyright Infringement
item.description: Shift Up, the developer of Stellar Blade, is being sued for copyright infringement by a small Louisiana-based film company.
